name: MIDICIResponder
desc: An object that responds to MIDI-CI inquiries from an initiator on behalf of a MIDI client, and handles profile and property exchange operations.

items.name: init(deviceInfo: MIDICIDeviceInfo, profileDelegate: MIDICIProfileResponderDelegate, profileStates: [MIDICIProfileState], supportProperties: Bool)
func stop()
items.desc: Stops receiving initiator requests and disconnects all connected initiators.

items.name: protocol MIDICIProfileResponderDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that defines the methods to respond to MIDI-CI responder life-cycle events.

items.name: typealias MIDICIInitiatiorMUID
items.desc: The unique MIDI-CI negotiation identifier to use for a responder connection.

items.name: struct MIDICIDeviceIdentification
items.desc: A structure that describes a MIDI-CI device.

items.name: class MIDICIDeviceInfo
items.desc: An object that provides basic information about a MIDI-CI device.

items.name: func notify(MIDICIProfile, onChannel: MIDIChannelNumber, isEnabled: Bool) -> Bool
items.desc: Enables or disables a profile and notifies all connected initiators.

items.name: func send(MIDICIProfile, onChannel: MIDIChannelNumber, profileData: Data) -> Bool
items.desc: Sends profile-specific data to all connected initiators.
